author: schor
msg: no Jira - change phase of RAT check to the default (verify) so that a bad check doesn't block most of the build activity.

author: cutting
msg: AVRO-122.  Fix so that, when multiple Ant targets are specified on the command line that depend on Ivy, Ivy does not fail.  Contributed by phunt.

author: mreutegg
msg: - must not use Text utility from jcr-tests

author: cutting
msg: AVRO-118.  JSON codec now permits one to read and write multiple instances without flushing or explicitly resetting the codec between each instance.  Contributed by Thiruvalluvan M. G.
